price: Зато не тражи да што пре буду кажњени, Ми им полако одбројавамо дане.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
